class gstTransform : public gstNode

Node class that adds 3D transformations and callbacks to nodes.

From header file: gstTransform.h

Constructors and Destructors
~gstTransformDestructor.
gstTransformThis class is intended as a base class only, the constructors are protected so that instances can not be created.
